title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 7.11 - Revision or cancellation of purchase orders
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 7.11 - Revision or cancellation of purchase orders

State Regulations

Requests for revision or cancellation of purchase orders on
file with the Comptroller shall be submitted on a "Purchase Order Change Notice

Form" bearing detailed explanation. Change orders cancelling purchase orders
will not be accepted for the purpose of freeing funds. When a cancellation is
made with the Comptroller, it must be made with the vendor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
7.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
